verses.verse: My son <S%H1121><s%>, attend <S%H7181><s%> unto my wisdom <S%H2451><s%>; Incline <S%H5186><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%> to my understanding <S%H8394><s%>:
That thou mayest preserve <S%H8104><s%> discretion <S%H4209><s%>, And that thy lips <S%H8193><s%> may keep <S%H5341><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.
For the lips <S%H8193><s%> of a strange woman <S%H2114><s%> drop <S%H5197><s%> honey <S%H5317><s%>, And her mouth <S%H2441><s%> is smoother <S%H2509><s%> than oil <S%H8081><s%>:
But in the end <S%H319><s%> she is bitter <S%H4751><s%> as wormwood <S%H3939><s%>, Sharp <S%H2299><s%> as a two-edged <S%H6310><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%>.
Her feet <S%H7272><s%> go down <S%H3381><s%> to death <S%H4194><s%>; Her steps <S%H6806><s%> take hold <S%H8551><s%> on Sheol <S%H7585><s%>;
So that she findeth <S%H6424><s%> not the level path <S%H734><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>: Her ways <S%H4570><s%> are unstable <S%H5128><s%>, and she knoweth it not <S%H3045><s%>.
Now therefore <S%H1121><s%>, my sons, hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H5493><s%>, And depart not from the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
Remove <S%H7368><s%> thy way <S%H1870><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from her <S%H7126><s%>, And come not nigh the door <S%H6607><s%> of her house <S%H1004><s%>;
Lest thou give <S%H5414><s%> thine honor <S%H1935><s%> unto others <S%H312><s%>, And thy years <S%H8141><s%> unto the cruel <S%H394><s%>;
Lest strangers <S%H2114><s%> be filled <S%H7646><s%> with thy strength <S%H3581><s%>, And thy labors <S%H6089><s%> be in the house <S%H1004><s%> of an alien <S%H5237><s%>,
And thou mourn <S%H5098><s%> at thy latter <S%H319><s%> end <S%H1320><s%>, When thy flesh and thy body <S%H1320><s%> are consumed <S%H3615><s%>,
And say <S%H559><s%>, How have I hated <S%H8130><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%>, And my heart <S%H3820><s%> despised <S%H5006><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%>;
Neither have I obeyed <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my teachers <S%H3384><s%>, Nor inclined <S%H5186><s%> mine ear <S%H241><s%> to them that instructed me <S%H3925><s%>!
I was well-nigh <S%H4592><s%> in all evil <S%H7451><s%> In the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%> and congregation <S%H6951><s%>.
Drink <S%H8354><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> out of thine own cistern <S%H953><s%>, And running waters <S%H5140><s%> out of <S%H8432><s%> thine own well <S%H875><s%>.
Should thy springs <S%H4599><s%> be dispersed <S%H6327><s%> abroad <S%H2351><s%>, And streams <S%H6388><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> in the streets <S%H7339><s%>?
Let them be for thyself alone <S%H2114><s%>, And not for strangers with thee.
Let thy fountain <S%H4726><s%> be blessed <S%H1288><s%>; And rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in the wife <S%H802><s%> of thy youth <S%H5271><s%>.

As a loving <S%H158><s%> hind <S%H365><s%> and a pleasant <S%H2580><s%> doe <S%H365><s%>, Let her breasts <S%H1717><s%> satisfy <S%H7301><s%> thee at all times <S%H6256><s%>; And be thou ravished <S%H7686><s%> always <S%H8548><s%> with her love <S%H160><s%>.
For why shouldest thou <S%H1121><s%>, my son, be ravished <S%H7686><s%> with a strange woman <S%H2114><s%>, And embrace <S%H2263><s%> the bosom <S%H2436><s%> of a foreigner <S%H5237><s%>?
For the ways <S%H1870><s%> of man <S%H376><s%> are before <S%H5227><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And he maketh level <S%H6424><s%> all his paths <S%H4570><s%>.
His own iniquities <S%H5771><s%> shall take <S%H3920><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, And he shall be holden <S%H8551><s%> with the cords <S%H2256><s%> of his sin <S%H2403><s%>.
He shall die <S%H4191><s%> for lack of instruction <S%H4148><s%>; And in the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of his folly <S%H200><s%> he shall go astray <S%H7686><s%>.
